wikipedia_page.main: George Joseph Harris (22 November 1904 – 28 December 1988) was an English cricketer. Harris was a right-handed batsman who bowled right-arm medium pace. He was born in Underwood, Nottinghamshire and was the older brother of famous Nottinghamshire batsman Charles Harris.

response: George Harris may refer to:

His elder brother, George Harris, played soccer for Mansfield Town and after being rejected by Nottinghamshire, played one first-class game with Glamorgan in 1932.
